author: lgray
body: This PR implements "sim particle flow" that uses the GEANT information to associate reconstructed tracks to reconstructed clusters in the HGCal endcap. Likewise, HGCal cluster (which are SimClusters introduced in pre10) are introduced to the reconstruction sequence and allowed to seed electrons, photons, etc. For example below, ak4 jets over the whole fiducial volume: Another example, ecalDrivenGsfElectrons (there's a bit of a fake problem right now in endcap, to fix): I tested this using a ttbar workflow for the "LocalReco" scenarios, where I modified the last step to include the full global reconstruction instead. @sethzenz @kpedro88
title: HGCal Global Reco (using "Sim Particle Flow" in endcaps)
